reuters.title: IMPERIAL OIL <IMO.A> RAISES CRUDE 32 CANADIAN CTS
reuters.body: Canadian Imperial Oil, 70 pct Exxon owned, said it raised its posting for light sweet crude oil at Edmonton by 32 canadian cts a barrel, effective today. The company said its new posting for light sweet crude oil at Edmonton is 25.60 canadian dlrs a barrel. Reuter 
